task.description: Allows agents to deposit Voicemail to another Agent/Agentroup mailbox. This privilege is required to control and monitor Voice Mailboxes.

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.VoiceMail.canTransferToVoicemail
task.displayName: Voicemail - Can Transfer directly to mailbox
task.description: Allows agents to transfer connected party to any Agent/Agentroup mailbox. This privilege is required to control and monitor Voice Mailboxes.

group.name: IWCaseInformationTasks
group.description: Privileges related to the usage of Case Information in Workspace

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.CaseInformation.canEdit
task.description: Enables agents to edit case information that is configured to be editable

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.CaseInformation.canAdd
task.description: Enables agents to add case information that is configured to be editable

group.name: IWTeamLeadTasks
group.description: Privileges that are related to Team Lead operations in Workspace

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.TeamLead.canUse
task.displayName: Team Lead - Can Use Team Lead
task.description: Allows access to Team Lead operations

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.TeamLead.canAutoMonitorVoice
task.displayName: Team Lead - Can Auto Monitor Voice Interactions
task.description: Allows the automatic monitoring of all the voice interactions of a selected agent

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.TeamLead.canAutoMonitorChat
task.displayName: Team Lead - Can Auto Monitor Chat Interactions
task.description: Allows the automatic monitoring of all the chat interactions of a selected agent

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.TeamLead.canMonitorCurrentVoice
task.displayName: Team Lead - Can Monitor Current Voice Interactions
task.description: Allows the monitoring of the current voice interactions of a selected agent

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.TeamLead.canMonitorCurrentChat
task.displayName: Team Lead - Can Monitor Current Chat interactions
task.description: Allows the monitoring of the current chat interactions of a selected agent

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.TeamLead.canAutoCoachVoice
task.displayName: Team Lead - Can Auto Coach Voice Interactions
task.description: Permits a Team Lead to automatically coach all the voice interactions of a selected agent.

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.TeamLead.canAutoCoachChat
task.displayName: Team Lead - Can Auto Coach Chat Interactions
task.description: Permits a Team Lead to automatically coach all the chat interactions of a selected agent.

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.TeamLead.canCoachCurrentVoice
task.displayName: Team Lead - Can Coach Current Voice Interactions
task.description: Permits a Team Lead to coach the current voice interactions of a selected agent.

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.TeamLead.canCoachCurrentChat
task.displayName: Team Lead - Can Coach Current Chat interactions
task.description: Permits a Team Lead to coach the current chat interactions of a selected agent.

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.TeamLead.canCoachVoice
task.displayName: Team Lead - Can Coach Chat Via Voice
task.description: Allows the team lead to coach an agent via the voice channel during a monitored chat interaction, or during a monitored voice interaction (only for TServer Cisco)

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.TeamLead.canBargeInVoice
task.description: Allows the team lead to barge in to voice interactions

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.TeamLead.canStopMonitoringVoice
task.displayName: Team Lead - Can Stop Monitoring Voice
task.description: Allows the team lead to stop Monitoring voice interactions for the selected agent

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.TeamLead.canCoachIM
task.displayName: Team Lead - Can Coach Chat And Voice Via IM
task.description: Allows the team lead to coach an agent via the instant messaging channel during a monitored chat or voice interaction

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.TeamLead.canCoachChat
task.displayName: Team Lead - Can Coach Chat Via Chat
task.description: Allows the team lead to coach an agent via the chat channel for a monitored chat interaction

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.TeamLead.canBargeInChat
task.description: Allows the team lead to Barge in to Chat interactions

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.TeamLead.canStopMonitoringChat
task.displayName: Team Lead - Can Stop Monitoring Chat
task.description: Allows the team lead to stop Monitoring chat interactions for the selected agent

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.TeamLead.canChangeAgentState
task.displayName: Team Lead - Can Change Agent State
task.description: Specifies that a Team Lead can change the status of a supervised Agent - Depends on 'Team Lead - Can Use'

group.name: IWSecurityTasks
group.description: Privileges that are related to security in Workspace

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.Security.canChangePassword
task.description: The agent is permitted to change their own password. This can be done by using a menu action.

group.name: IWSMSTasks

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.SMS.canUse
task.description: Allows access to the SMS channel

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.SMS.canDeclineSMS
task.description: Allows agents to decline incoming SMS interactions. Depends on 'SMS - Can Use SMS Channel'

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.SMS.canOneStepTransfer
task.description: Enables instant transfer of SMS interactions. Depends on 'SMS - Can Use SMS Channel'

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.SMS.canSetInteractionDisposition
task.description: Allows agents to set the disposition code of SMS interactions. Depends on 'SMS - Can Use SMS Channel'

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.SMS.canCreate

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.SMS.canSaveAttachedFile

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.Callback.canRejectInvitation

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.Callback.canRescheduleCurrentCallback

task.description: Allows agent to reschedule a Callback interaction or submit a new Callback by using a new phone number. Depends on 'Callback - Can Use Callback' and 'Callback - Can Reschedule Current Callback" or 'Callback - Can Submit New Callback'.

task.description: Allows agent to submit a new Callback out of any Callback context. Depends on 'Callback - Can Use Callback'.

group.name: IWEmailTasks

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.Email.canDecline

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.Email.canSend

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.Email.canInterimSend
task.description: Allows agent to send interim outbound E-Mail reply. Depends on 'E-Mail - Can Use E-mail Channel'.

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.Email.canSave
task.description: Allows agent to save draft new or reply outbound E-Mail. Depends on 'E-Mail - Can Use E-mail Channel'.

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.Email.canAddAttachments
task.description: Allows agent to add attached files to outbound E-Mail. Depends on 'E-Mail - Can Use E-mail Channel'.

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.Email.canDelete
task.description: Allows agent to delete a draft new or reply outbound E-Mail. Depends on 'E-Mail - Can Use E-mail Channel'.

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.Email.canOneStepTransfer
task.description: Enables instant transfer of E-Mail interactions. Depends on 'E-Mail - Can Use E-mail Channel'.

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.Email.canPrint
task.description: Enables printing of E-Mail interactions

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.Email.canSetInteractionDisposition
task.description: Allows agent to set disposition code of E-Mail interactions. Depends on 'E-Mail - Can Use E-mail Channel'.

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.Email.canMarkDone
task.description: Allows agents to mark done inbound e-mail without further processing. Depends on 'E-Mail - Can Use E-mail Channel'

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.Email.canForwardToExtResource

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.Email.canInLineForwardToExtResource
task.description: Allows agents to forward inbound e-mail interactions to external resources. Depends on 'E-Mail - Can Use E-mail Channel'

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.Email.canChangeFormatNewEmail

task.description: The agent is permitted to switch the format of a new outbound e-mail interaction between HTML and plain text. Depends on 'E-Mail - Can Use E-mail Channel'

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.Email.canChangeFormatReplyEmail

task.description: The agent is permitted to switch the format of a reply outbound e-mail interaction between HTML and plain text. Depends on 'E-Mail - Can Use E-mail Channel'

task.description: The agent is permitted to add embedded image in outbound e-mail from clipboard or file explorer.

group.name: IWChatTasks
group.description: Privileges related to the handling of Chat interactions in Workspace

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.Chat.canUse
task.description: Allows access to Chat channel

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.Chat.canDeclineChat
task.description: Allows agent to decline incoming Chat interactions. Depends on 'Chat - Can Use Chat Channel'.

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.Chat.canRelease
task.description: Allows the agent to manually terminate a standard non-asynchronous chat conversation. Depends on 'Chat - Can Use Chat Channel'.

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.Chat.canReleaseAsync
task.description: Allows the agent to manually terminate an asynchronous chat conversation. Depends on 'Chat - Can Use Chat Channel'.

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.Chat.canOneStepTransfer
task.description: Enables instant transfer of chat interactions. Depends on 'Chat - Can Use Chat Channel'.

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.Chat.canOneStepConference
task.description: Enables instant chat conference. Depends on 'Chat - Can Use Chat Channel'.

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.Chat.canPushUrl
task.description: Allows agent to push URL's to customers during chat sessions. Depends on 'Chat - Can Use Chat Channel'.

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.Chat.canSetInteractionDisposition
task.description: Allows agent to set disposition code of Chat interactions. Depends on 'Chat - Can Use Chat Channel'.

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.Chat.Monitoring.ShowSilentMonitoring
task.description: Lets agent be informed that current chat session is silently monitored by a supervisor. Depends on 'Chat - Can Use Chat Channel'.

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.Chat.canTwoStepTransfer
task.description: Enables chat transfer in two steps, started by a chat consultation. Depends on 'Chat - Can Use Chat Channel'.

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.Chat.canTwoStepConference
task.description: Enables chat conference in two steps, started by a chat consultation. Depends on 'Chat - Can Use Chat Channel'

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.Chat.canPreviewCustomerTyping
task.description: Allows agent to preview the text being typed by the customer before he actually sends it. Depends on 'Chat - Can Use Chat Channel'

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.Chat.CanTransferFileFromStandardResponse
task.displayName: Chat - Can Transfer File From Standard Response
task.description: Allows agent to send files attached to standard responses over chat protocol. Depends on 'Chat - Can Use Chat Channel'

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.Chat.CanTransferFileFromFileSystem

task.description: Allows agent to send files from local file system over chat protocol. Depends on 'Chat - Can Use Chat Channel'

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.Chat.canSaveAttachedFiles

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.Chat.canUseEmojis
task.description: Allows agent to add Emojis to chat transcript. Depends on 'Chat - Can Use Chat Channel'

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.Chat.CanPlaceOnHoldAsync
task.description: Allows agent to leave a chat session marked as 'asynchronous' in a way that it can be resumed later

group.name: IWWorkItemTasks
group.description: Privileges related to the handling of Workitem interactions in Workspace. Depends on 'SMS - Can Use SMS Channel'.

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.WorkItem.canUse
task.description: Allows access to all WorkItem channels (different from sms, chat and e-mail)

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.WorkItem.canOneStepTransfer
task.description: Enables instant transfer of workitem interactions. Depends on 'Workitem - Can Use Workitem Channel'.

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.WorkItem.canSetInteractionDisposition
task.description: Allows agent to set disposition code of workitem interactions. Depends on 'Workitem - Can Use Workitem Channel'.

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.WorkItem.canMoveToWorkbin
task.description: Allows agent to move workitem interactions to workbins. Depends on 'Workitem - Can Use Workitem Channel'.

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.WorkItem.canDecline
task.description: Allows agents to decline incoming workitem interactions. Depends on 'Workitem - Can Use Workitem Channel'

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.WorkItem.canMarkDone
task.description: Allows agents to mark done Workitem without further processing. Depends on 'Workitem - Can Use Workitem Channel'

group.name: IWOutboundTasks
group.description: Privileges related to the handling of Outbound Campaign Calls and Records in Workspace

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.Outbound.canUse
task.description: Allows access to the Outbound Campaign functions

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.Outbound.canRejectRecord
task.description: Allows agent to decline a preview record so that it can be processed by somebody else in the campaign. Depends on 'Outbound - Can Use'.

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.Outbound.canCancelRecord
task.description: Allows agent to decline a preview record so that it is not processed at all during the current campaign. Depends on 'Outbound - Can Use'.

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.Outbound.canDialAlternativeChainedRecord
task.displayName: Outbound - Can Dial Alternative Chained Record
task.description: Allows agent to dial a number from the preview record chain that is different from the number selected by the system. Depends on 'Outbound - Can Use'.

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.Outbound.canDialOnNewNumber
task.displayName: Outbound - Can Dial On New Number
task.description: Allows agent to dial an outbound contact on a new number (which results in a new record added to the chain). Depends on 'Outbound - Can Use' and 'Outbound - Can Dial Alternative Chained Record'.

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.Outbound.canGetNextRecord
task.displayName: Outbound - Can Get Next Preview Record
task.description: Allows agent to request a new preview record while the processing of the previous one terminates. Depends on 'Outbound - Can Use'.

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.Outbound.canUsePushPreview
task.description: Allows agent to actively take part in Outbound Push Preview campaigns. Depends on 'Outbound - Can Use'.

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.Outbound.canMarkDoNotCall
task.displayName: Outbound - Can Mark Do Not Call
task.description: Allows agent to mark a contact as Do Not Call. Depends on 'Outbound - Can Use'.

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.Outbound.canSetCallResult
task.description: Allows agent to set a call result to the outbound record. Depends on 'Outbound - Can Use'.

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.Outbound.canReschedule
task.description: The agent is permitted to reschedule an outbound record for an active call. Use the 'Outbound - Can Reschedule Before Call' privilege to allow rescheduling before the call is dialed. Depends on 'Outbound - Can Use'.

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.Outbound.canRescheduleBeforeCall
task.description: The agent is permitted to reschedule an outbound record before calling the contact (in Pull and Push Preview Mode). Requires privilege 'Outbound - Can Reschedule'.

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.Outbound.canRescheduleOnNewNumber
task.displayName: Outbound - Can Reschedule On New Number
task.description: Allows agent to reschedule an outbound record on a new number (which results in a new record added to the chain). Depends on 'Outbound - Can Use'.

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.Outbound.canEditRecordData
task.description: Allows agent to edit the outbound record fields configured as editable

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.Outbound.PushPreview.canDecline
task.description: Allows agent to decline incoming push preview interactions. Depends on 'Outbound - Can Use'PushPreview.

group.name: IWStandardResponseTasks
group.description: Privileges related to the usage of Standard Responses in Workspace

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.SRL.canUse
task.description: Allows access to the Standard Response Library functions

group.name: IWTeamCommunicatorTasks
group.description: Privileges related to the usage of Team Communicator in Workspace

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.TeamCommunicator.canUse
task.description: Allows access to the Team Communicator in Workspace

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.TeamCommunicator.canViewFavorites
task.description: Allows agent to view favorites in Team Communicator. Depends on 'Team Communicator - Can Use'.

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.TeamCommunicator.canManageFavorites
task.description: Allows agent to add, edit and remove personal favorites in Team Communicator. Depends on 'Team Communicator - Can Use and Team Communicator - Can View Favorites'.

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.TeamCommunicator.canViewRecentCalls
task.displayName: Team Communicator - Can View Recent Calls
task.description: Allows agent to view recently contacted resources in Team Communicator. Depends on 'Team Communicator - Can Use'.

task.name: InteractionWorkspace.TeamCommunicator.canViewAll
task.description: The agent is permitted to search within all internal targets and contacts in the Team Communicator. This privilege is dependent on Team Communicator - Can Use.
